hero.name: Alex Doe
hero.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
hero.intro: Building scalable web applications, modern UIs, and robust architectures.

about.content: With 6 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in architecting scalable systems from the ground up. My expertise spans building dynamic, accessible frontends with React, to engineering resilient backend APIs with Spring Boot. I have a proven track record of implementing robust JWT authentication, real-time features using WebSockets and WebRTC, and optimizing performance for high-traffic applications. I thrive in environments that challenge me to continuously solve complex engineering problems.

projects.title: Enterprise E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A high-performance e-commerce platform handling 10k+ concurrent users with real-time inventory management.
projects.challenges: Resolving inventory desync under high load and minimizing frontend rendering bottlenecks.
projects.architecture: Implemented a CQRS pattern on the backend with Redis caching layer. Frontend utilizes React Server Components for optimal LCP.

projects.title: Real-time Code Collaborative Editor
projects.description: A browser-based collaborative environment allowing multiple developers to edit code simultaneously with presence indicators.
projects.challenges: Managing concurrent operational transformations to prevent code conflicts during simultaneous edits.
projects.architecture: Utilizes WebRTC for low-latency peer-to-peer communication, with a WebSocket signaling server as a fallback.

engineering.philosophy: Software engineering is more than just writing code; it's about building resilient, maintainable, and scalable systems. I prioritize clean code principles, comprehensive testing, and thoughtful architecture. My approach is pragmatic, preferring proven patterns over trendy tech, while always keeping an eye on performance and user experience.
